thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Would stay again
thread.title_full: Would stay again - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: beauville47
title: Would stay again
text:
We stayed 1 night as we were going to see Wicked the musical. The location made the whole trip so easy. 3 minutes from Victoria station and 2 minutes from the station meant we spent nothing on cabs and wasted no time.
We had an apartment which was 1 king size bed and a sofa bed in the lounge. Small kitchenette too!
We found the room perfect and exactly what we needed. A separate shower would have been nicer, I'm never a fan of showering in the bath. Room are spacious too!
Staff were all lovely and housekeeping delivered extra towels very quickly indeed.
I would 100% stay here again and really enjoyed my time here.
(We didn't have breakfast at the hotel as we decided to have breakfast elsewhere as it was a nice Sunday morning)
